name: Rose Petal Jam
author: Crystal McChesney
summary: A delightfully sweet tart jam. An extraordinary gift for any occasion.
ingredients: 8 ounces fresh rose petals, white base trimmed off
directions: Toss the rose petals, lemon juice, and 1 cup sugar together in a bowl until the petals are evenly coated
Let stand at room temperature overnight
Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat
Stir in the rose petal mixture and reserved 1 cup of sugar; stir until the sugar has dissolved
Reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer 20 minutes
Increase the heat to medium-high, and return the mixture to a boil for 5 minutes
Stir in the pectin, and boil for 1 minute
Pour the jam into 4 sterilized half-pint jars
Seal with rings and lids, and store in a cool dark place
